file_content.text: It was... it was that traitor, Brel Orus. He gave the Imps our position somehow.
We fought hard, but they overran us. They tore straight through and grabbed Vik.
They'll take him to the Balmorran Arms Factory. The Imps built a prison in the back of the complex... no one ever comes out.
I'm going to get Vik back. Period.
We'll see about that.
You're a real hero. You and Vik both... you're heroes.
You're a hero... a real hero. Just like Vik.
Do you know anything more about the prison, or Vik's captors?
Can you tell me anything else?
No, that place is a fortress, the strongest on Balmorra. I don't know of anyone who's made it inside.
Lots of... lots of guards, at the Balmorran Arms Factory. Very dangerous.
I don't care how many Imps I have to kill--I'm getting Vik and getting off this rock.
Time to finish this.
You're the best in the Republic. I know you can do it.
Your condition is stabilized, soldier--but get to a safe location immediately.
Thanks. I can make my own way back. You two need to save Vik.
Good luck, friend. I'm going to get back to base before these stims wear off.
You can do it... I know you can do it....
You will not have died in vain, noble freedom fighter! The warriors of Havoc Squad will see justice done!
Tough break. Let's make sure he didn't die for nothing.
Thus is his journey ended, and our next path revealed. Let us finish this fight, in honor of those fallen.
Let's move out!
No time to waste.
Time to strike back.
When we find Vik, I swear I'm going to kill him. Let's go.
Vik has a lot to answer for.
Help... got to help. They took him. The Imps took Vik.
Can you do anything for him, Dorne?
Medic!
I'm on it, sir.
Just tell me what happened, soldier.
Take it easy.
Why can't anything be easy?
You've got to be kidding me.
Try to lie still. Here.
I thought... I thought we were home free.
Tell me exactly what happened here. Now!
I need details!
Try to go easy on him, sir. These injuries are serious. Let me help you.
Ugh... th--thank you.
Please... there are so many Balmorrans locked up there. Try to release our brothers. Please, set them free....
There are a lot of other soldiers in that prison, too. Please, free them if you can.
I won't leave anyone behind.
Consider it done.
Thank you. Thank you for everything.
We'll see.
If anyone could do it, it's you.
My mission is to find Vik, not lead a prison break.
They aren't my problem.
Please just try... you're the only one who can save them now.
